entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 6 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Snow beginning near noon then changing to rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon then to 70 gusting to 100 except gusting to 150 in the Wreckhouse area late in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 25 January 2023
